post.text:
DON'T LET HER FOOL US AGAIN.
#DangerousHillary

comment.author: Kyler
comment.text: DONALD J. TRUMP****** Keep pounding on the ISSUE'S and going after Hillary on her Corrupt emails and foundation. STOP WASTING time going after republicans . These republicans WITHOUT DOUBT are going to VOTE for you in that booth . They know with Hillary nothing will get accomplished. You must know they will be voting for you. STAY ON HAMMERING OUT THE ISSUE'S. You have the base its the Undeciders's WE NEED...............

replies.author: David
replies.text: The scariest part of all this is not the just fact that TRUMP is a habitual liar, but the fact that he honestly has no concept of the definition of the word "truth". He has spent his whole life living in a bubble of privilege, that to him, a "lie" is simply anything that makes him look bad and the "truth" is whatever he says it is - even if that changes from minute to minute. This is what comes from never having been taught values, morals or ethics. Makes you wonder how he REALLY made all of his money. He is delusional and so are all o f his "Cult of Trump" followers. #CultOfTrump

replies.author: David
replies.text: Donald Trump = Jim Jones & the crap he's handing out today is nothing more than poisoned Kool-Aid! Don't drink it! #CultOfTrump btw: Heard his Taj Majal is closing. Is that another one of his "successful business ventures"? Or is he going to blame it all on a conspiracy against him? You know, if he was an effective businessman, he could have turned it around, right? Nah, he's just a LOSER!
